query: SELECT testCategory, COUNT(*) as total_tests, SUM(CASE WHEN isAutomated = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as automated_tests, SUM(CASE WHEN isAutomated = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as manual_tests FROM testRegistry GROUP BY testCategory ORDER BY total_tests DESC
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2TnkFjGBKdfpupi.root --database B3x5NWCFiG4wF9DctXvqsL --execute SELECT testCategory, COUNT(*) as total_tests, SUM(CASE WHEN isAutomated = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as automated_tests, SUM(CASE WHEN isAutomated = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as manual_tests FROM testRegistry GROUP BY testCategory ORDER BY total_tests DESC
